mapper.select: select Application.ID as ApplicationID,UserID,RoomID,SubmitTime,ZhouCi,XingQi, SJieCi,EJieCi,Application.Type as ApplicationType,Purpose, ReviewerID, ReviewTime, Approval,ReviewContent, User.Name as UserName from Application,User,Classroom where Application.UserID=User.ID and Application.RoomID=Classroom.ID and Approval is null and Classroom.available=true and (ZhouCi > #{zhouCiNow} or (ZhouCi=#{zhouCiNow} and XingQi > #{xingQiNow}));

select Application.ID as ApplicationID, Application.Type as ApplicationType, Application.*, User.Name as UserName, Phone, Email, Department, Classroom.Name as ClassroomName, Classroom.Type as RoomType, XiaoQu,JiaoXueQu, JiaoXueLou, Floor, Capacity from Application,User,Classroom where Application.ID=#{id} and Application.UserID=User.ID and Application.RoomID=Classroom.ID;
select distinct XiaoQu from Application as a,Classroom as c where a.RoomID=c.ID and Approval is not null;
select distinct JiaoXueQu from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu};
select distinct JiaoXueLou from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu};
select distinct Type from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu} and JiaoXueLou=#{jiaoXueLou};
select distinct Floor from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu} and JiaoXueLou=#{jiaoXueLou} and Type=#{type};
mapper.update: update Application set ReadFeedback=#{readFeedback} where ID=${id};
mapper.select: select * from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu} and JiaoXueLou=#{jiaoXueLou} and Type=#{type};
select Application.ID as ApplicationID,Application.*,User.Name as UserName,User.* from Application,User where Application.UserID=User.ID and RoomID=#{roomID};
